alert.note: Alert for Cherry; Sheridan (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 04 at 12:00AM CDT until July 04 at 12:15AM CDT by NWS NorthPlatte
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1115 PM MDT FOR NORTHWESTERN CHERRY AND NORTHEASTERN SHERIDAN COUNTIES... At 1059 PM MDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 6 miles southeast of Wolf Creek Housing to 18 miles southeast of Rushville, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Gordon, Clinton, Big Hill, Morgan Lake, Billys Lake, Lone Butte, Irwin, Smith Lake State Wildlife Management Area, Rock Hill, Bayonne, Hoover Lake and Argo Hill. This includes the following highways... Highway 20 between mile markers 93 and 134. Highway 250 between mile markers 18 and 34. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
